column5: Hello all, it's been a while....my kids now have the fishing bug and I would like to take them fishing in the perry sound or Muskoka area. Does anyone know of any good shore or dock location where we can fish. Any help would be appriateted . Cheers

I've fished from Muskoka Wharf in Gravenhurst a few times. It's a pretty nice area to boot.  https://www.google.ca/maps/place/295+Steamship+Bay+Rd,+Gravenhurst,+ON+P1P+1Z9/@44.920253,-79.391566,17z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x4d2a9a8af9117fe9:0x815f1c588790b618  Some nice crappie there, along with LM bass.  You can also head up the road to the mouth of the Hoc Roc river on Muskoka Beach Rd, where you might find a pike or three.
Thanks for the info, the kids say they want bigger fish so maybe the pike
